I will shave your chin right off!
Are not you the owner of this place?
The sword is actually the Stand,
So the guy in Kom Ombo was not the user?
No matter how many times you try, you are still no match for me!
After last time, I memorized your Chariot's moves and powers!
I will never lose to someone I have fought before!
Come on, you have almost got it.
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
Polnareff and Jotaro seem to be taking a while.
It would be pretty dangerous for your Star Platinum to fight it with his bare hands.
And the guy's not the user!
N-Not to mention, this Stand's gotten stronger!
Now I have learned just how much punishment you can take, too.
I wonder if you will be able to withstand this next attack, Polnareff.
I-It is getting stronger... with every strike!
I have learned all of your attack patterns.
Once I have fought an opponent, even if my wielder has changed...
No matter what, no matter what, no matter what, no matter what...
I do not have a weapon anymore...
It took everything I had just to land that punch.
This is the first combat Stand
we have seen in a while that does not rely on schemes or spells...
Just as I would expect from Star Platinum.
You are as fast as I have heard.
But now I have learned all of those moves.
If you do not want to be cut down,
The more we fight it, the faster it gets.
Th-The next attack will be the fastest,
strongest, and most intense attack yet!
He is trying to cut me down.
I cannot believe you caught my blade...
Star Platinum's strength does not come from its speed and precision alone.
It is also Jotaro's ability to stay cool under fire.
Jotaro, do not touch that sword!
Even now, the Stand's evil powers could still be active.
Anyone who touches the drawn blade falls under its spell.
Let us sheathe it, but without touching it.
If it gets drawn again, we will be in trouble.
This thing's learned about our powers.
We may not be able to beat it again.
How about we toss it in the Nile to lay at the bottom forever?
Could you get this guy to a hospital?
I came when someone reported a fight, and I find this!
Why do you have a sword?!
Did he fall under the spell of the cursed sword?
Are not you an officer of the law?
You are the one who drew it, are not you?!
I do not know where the Stand's real user is,
but it seems Polnareff's fallen under their spell.
But I have never thought about fighting Polnareff before.
I know I cannot hold back if I end up fighting Chariot.
Even if I win, it will mean killing Polnareff.
Do not forget that I, Anubis, have learned all of Star Platinum's moves.
Someone I have fought before can never, ever hope to defeat me!
I have to stop the sword!
I will have to catch it again!
This is the fastest Stand that we have faced.
I-I am going to lose this fight.
If I do not fight Polnareff with my full strength, I am going to be killed.
To think you would escape from a failed blade-catch with a headbutt...
I know that move now, too.
You are thinking about how you will die if you do not kill Polnareff, right?
I am going to show you something so amazing, it will finish you off right here and now.
If he gets faster on top of having an extra sword...
I will stop him before he kills me!
My right arm is as light as a feather now.
I guess that was one option...
There is no way your ora ora can withstand two master Stands' dual swords!
I have taken care of Jotaro!
Do not think you will be able to stop the blade or pull it out.
memorized and surpassed the power of your Star Platinum.
I will just push it in farther...
Y-You are going to push it in?
Do not push it any further...
I will push it in and tear your guts to shreds!
By the way, did not you say you were going to tear me up?
That is why I said that if you pushed it in any further, it would be murder.
The sword had stopped moving, so it was easy to target.
Still, that was a strong enemy.
This last move took everything I had.
I am glad it was enough to defeat him before he could learn it, too.
This is the first time I have ever felt so tired.
I have to hurry and meet up with Avdol and the old man.
D-Do not tell me I was being controlled by the cursed sword...
Polnareff, get the old man and Avdol.
I am too tired to walk.
And now I have learned it...
The true user of Anubis was the blacksmith
who forged this sword over five hundred years ago.
This means that I am a Stand with no user.
Lord Dio pulled me out of the darkness of a museum storeroom.
Lord Dio's Stand, The World, is a powerful Stand that I could never hope to defeat.
That is why I swore my loyalty to him.
Jotaro, no matter what, I will kill you!
I have learned all of your powers.
You will never see it coming!
I will stab you in the back!
Where did that dog come from?!
Eating that right off the ground...
At this rate, I am going to fall in the river!
If I fall into the river, I am done for!
On this air current, I will hit that wall and stop!
I was so panicked, I accidentally used my power to phase through the wall!
If I stick in the boat,
the boatman will get curious and try to pull me out.
Then, I will take over his mind!
Once I control the boatman, I will begin my counterattack on Jotaro!
A cow was on the boat!
I will take over the cow's mind!
I will not make it in time!
That cow over there is freaking out about something.
Just go get the old man and Avdol.
Come on, take me up to the surface.
I will give you something good to eat.
Do not leave me, Mr. Crab!
I will be rusted through in couple of days!
There is nothing to eat over there.
What the hell do you eat to make your farts smell like this?!
To think, all of that happened without us.
That must have been rough, Jotaro.
I am never going anywhere with him again.
Stop it already, you stupid mutt!
Though they may all look similar to tourists, there are many races that live in Egypt.
wearing a garment called a jellabiya.
This is a Bedouin, a man of the desert.
This is an Indian, who has nothing to do with this.
And this does not have much to do with race, but...
I cannot keep my eyes off of her.
What do you think you are doing, you old pervert?!
When you encounter something you are not supposed to touch...
